alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Northumberland; Richmond; Western Essex; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 8:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN NORTHUMBERLAND... RICHMOND...SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND AND CENTRAL ESSEX COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 859 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Warsaw, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warsaw and Haynesville around 905 PM EDT. Kinsale around 915 PM EDT. Hague around 920 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Wellford, Ethel, Lottsburg, Threeway, Village, Mount Holly, Oldhams, Lyells, Naylors Beach, and Kennard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Northumberland; Richmond; Western Essex; Westmoreland
